TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Canvas extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel

summary.span: 使用 區域的相對座標，定義可以明確定位子項目位置的區域。

span.span: Defines an area within which you can explicitly position child elements by using coordinates that are relative to the area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含的集合中的物件屬性。A contains a collection of objects, which are in the property. 是具有沒有固有的版面配置特性的唯一面板項目。 is the only panel element that has no inherent layout characteristics. A具有預設和屬性為零，除非它是元素的子系，也會自動調整大小及其子項目。A has default and properties of zero, unless it is the child of an element that automatically sizes its child elements. 子項目的會永遠不會調整大小，它們只位於其指定的座標。Child elements of a are never resized, they are just positioned at their designated coordinates. 這可提供彈性的固有的調整大小條件約束或對齊的情況下不需要或不想要。This provides flexibility for situations in which inherent sizing constraints or alignment are not needed or wanted. 對於您想要設定自動調整大小和對齊子內容的情況下，它通常最好是使用項目。For cases in which you want child content to be automatically resized and aligned, it is usually best to use a element. 屬性會決定共用相同的座標空間的子項目出現的順序。The property determines the order in which child elements that share the same coordinate space appear. 較高一個子元素的值會指出這個項目會出現上另一個子系項目具有較低的值。A higher value for one child element indicates that this element will appear above another child element that has a lower value. 如果您指定資料庫，附加屬性或優先於或屬性。If you specify them, the attached properties or take priority over the or properties. 子項目的一定會給您想將完整大小。Child elements of a are always given the full size that they desire. 如此一來，垂直對齊和水平對齊方式不影響內。As a result, vertical alignment and horizontal alignment have no effect inside a . 是您可以使用絕對位置的子內容的最上層版面配置控制項。 is a top-level layout control that you can use for absolute positioning of child content. 繪製和繪圖，您使用筆刷並不需要使用。For painting and drawing, you use brushes and do not have to use a . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[使用單色和漸層概觀繪製](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md)。For more information, see [Painting with Solid Colors and Gradients Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/painting-with-solid-colors-and-gradients-overview.md). 根據預設，面板項目不會接收焦點。By default, panel elements do not receive focus. 若要強迫要接收焦點的控制台項目，設定屬性`true`。To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會產生三個項目，每個項目 100 像素。The following example produces three elements, each element 100 pixels. 第一個是紅色和其左上角 (*x，y*) 位置指定為 （0，0）。The first is red, and its upper-left (*x, y*) position is specified as (0, 0). 第二個為綠色，且其左上角位置 （100，100），這是正下方和右邊的第一方。The second is green, and its upper-left position is (100, 100), which is just below, and to the right of, the first square. 第三個是藍色，以及其左上角位置 （50，50）。The third is blue, and its upper-left position is (50, 50). 因此，第三個涵蓋的第一個橔和第二個左上方。Hence, the third covers the lower-right quadrant of the first and the upper-left quadrant of the second. 因為第三個配置最新，它出現在其他兩個方塊的最上層 — 也就是重疊的部分假設的第三個色彩。Because the third is laid out last, it appears to be on top of the other two squares—that is, the overlapping portions assume the color of the third . [!code-csharp[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/CSharp/Canvas_Ovw_Sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/VisualBasic/canvas_vb.vb#1)] [!code-xaml[CanvasOvwSample#1](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CanvasOvwSample/XAML/default.xaml#1)]
